item.description:
After a hard few days of snow and shoveling it, let's go to the movies!!! I'm sure the roads will be clear by then.

Your choice of these two great "Academy-nominated" movies: "Notes on a Scandal" or "Pan's Labyrinth." (Don't know what the admission charge is.)

If you can make it, meet me at 5:30 pm at the bar of Chowder Pot (next door to the cinema) for drinks and appetizers before the movie.

If you can't go to Chowder Pot, then meet us at 6:45pm at the cinema. "Pan's" starts at 7:10 pm; "Notes" starts at 7:30 pm.

Directions from the North:
I 91 S to exit 27 toward Brainard Rd;
Turn LEFT onto Airport Rd; Turn slight RIGHT oto Brainard Rd;
Chowder Pot on your RIGHT; Cinemas on RIGHT beyond Chowder Pot.

Directions from the South:
I 91 N to exit 27;
Turn RIGHT onto Brainard Rd;
Chowder Pot on your RIGHT; Cinemas on RIGHT beyond Chowder Pot.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: A Night At the Movies
